description: create, update, or destroy Ansible Tower role.

job_template.description: The job_template the role acts on.

tower_config_file.description: Path to the Tower config file. See notes.

team.description: Team that receives the permissions specified by the role.

target_team.description: Team that the role acts on.

tower_verify_ssl.description: Dis/allow insecure connections to Tower. If C(no), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.

user.description: User that receives the permissions specified by the role.
